hi all.   I am interested in disabling some portions of the build process =
to make incremental development builds complete faster.
I have been able to=
 skip the unit tests by using this option:   maven dist -Dmaven.test.skip=
=3Dtrue
However, I'd also really like to be able to skip the javadoc/docboo=
k/xdoc portions of the build.
Thanks!
-Erik
